segment.source: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 deployment.
segment.target: This checklist can be used to help you plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 7 deployment.

segment.source: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for product deployment.
segment.target: This checklist outlines the recommended steps and a high-level list of items to consider when planning for product deployment.

segment.source: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.
segment.target: It is recommended that you copy this checklist into a spreadsheet program and customize it for your use.

segment.source: Review the DaRT 7 Supported Configurations information to confirm that the computers you have selected for client or feature installation meet the minimum hardware and operating system requirements.
segment.target: Review the DaRT 7 Supported Configurations information to confirm that the computers you have selected for client or feature installation meet the minimum hardware and operating system requirements.

segment.source: Understand the deployment prerequisites and decide which tools to include on the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Understand the deployment prerequisites and decide which tools to include on the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Determine which method, or methods, you will use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: Determine which method, or methods, you will use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 7.0 Recovery Image
